column4: hello gents...can anyone give me any leads on what might be causing the error pictured here http://chadjohnson.ath.cx/error.jpg ? This happens when I resume from suspend with a Turion X2 on Mint Linux Elyssa (based on Hardy)
assuming this is not distro-specific though, anyone seen this error?
unfortunately, suspend/resume tends to be sketchy on some laptops, and need tweaking (or just can't be made to work). You'll really need to try the linuxmint folks, I think.
